decks.notes: The deck revolves around quickly filling the graveyard with powerful creatures using cards like Entomb and Reanimate, then bringing them back onto the battlefield for a quick win. It also includes disruption elements like Force of Will and Daze to protect the combo. The deck utilizes a mix of traditional reanimation targets like Archon of Cruelty and innovative choices like Atraxa, Grand Unifier. The inclusion of cards like Animate Dead and Undercity Sewers provide flexibility and additional reanimation options. Overall, the deck aims to assemble its combo pieces quickly and overwhelm the opponent with powerful threats.

The primary focus of this deck is to utilize a combination of spells and creatures to quickly mill through the library and set up a win condition using Thassa's Oracle. By playing cards like Dark Ritual, Lotus Petal, and Simian Spirit Guide, the deck aims to accelerate its game plan and cast combo pieces such as Balustrade Spy and Undercity Informer to mill the library. The inclusion of cards like Pact of Negation and Cabal Therapy provides protection and disruption to help the deck execute its combo efficiently.

The deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's game plan while quickly deploying threats of its own to control the pace of the game. By utilizing a combination of counter spells, removal spells, and disruptive creatures, it aims to maintain tempo advantage throughout the match. Cards like Force of Will, Thoughtseize, and Daze help in disrupting the opponent's strategy, while Orcish Bowmasters, Kaito, Bane of Nightmares, and Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student provide a steady stream of threats to pressure the opponent. The deck excels at maintaining control of the game while applying consistent pressure to close out matches efficiently.
